description: The controversial technique will no longer be taught to police officers but will not be banned.
title: France backs away from chokehold ban following police protests
title_page: France backs away from chokehold ban following police protests - BBC News
maintext: On Monday, national police director Fr¨¦d¨¦ric Veaux sent a letter to staff clarifying the announcements made by the interior minister. In it, he said the measure would no longer be taught in training schools but could be used "with discernment".
